thread.section_title: Fastport Passport Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fastport Passport | fastportpassport.com
thread.title: Stephen

author: Stephen
title: Stephen
text: Complicated story i wont bore anyone with the stress i was under to secure a passport and Russian visa literally within 1 week. My passport did not have 6 months of validity and needed this to travel and get the visa on time. It felt a bit like mission impossible but i spoke with the Fastport team and they walked me through the process in about 20 minutes. I did have a bunch of questions but the instructions did answer most of them. I prepared the documents and off to Fedex i went. They did send me a label to ship in my application. I only had to make one phone call to calm my nerves to find out the passport was renewed and the visa was now in process. I have just received the passport this morning with the visa. Very relieved, Very Happy!
